greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{i|n, j|n, k|n} i*j*k/lcm(i,j,k).
formula: If p is prime, a(p) = 4 + 3*p + p^2.
mathematica: a[n_]:= Sum[i*j*k/LCM[i,j,k], {i, (d = Divisors[n])}, {j, d}, {k, d}]; Array[a, 50] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 10 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, i, sumdiv(n, j, sumdiv(n, k, i*j*k/lcm([i, j, k]))));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 10 2021
